page.title: 12TURF CUTTING
page.content: THERE IS A SPECIAL TYPE OF SPADE WITH A WING ON ONE SIDE FOR CUTTING THE TURF.USUALLY THERE ARE 3 MEN WORKING IN THE BOG TOGETHER. ONE CUTS, ONE LIFTS AND ONE WHEELS.YOU TAKE 15CM OF THE SURFACE LAYER BEFORE YOU START CUTTING.THE SODS ARE THEN CUT AND WHEELED A SHORT DISTANCE AWAY.WHEN THEY ARE PARTLY DRY THEY CAN BE PUT INTO CLAMPS OR CASTLES AND LEFT FOR A FEW WEEKS TO SEASON AND DRY OUT. THEN THEY ARE BAGGED AND TAKEN HOME. 31 OUT OF 35 IN OUR CLASS USE TURF FOR HEATING.TURF CAN BE USED FOR MANY THINGS E.G.FOR MAKING ORNAMENTS,IN GARDENING AND IN POWER STATIONS TO MAKE ELECTRICITY.MACHINES TO CUT TURF WHICH ARE ATTACHED TO A TRACTOR ARE RECENTLY BECOMING COMMON AND FEW ARE NOW CUTTING TURF BY HAND.
